name: POKE New York
tag_list: social-media-strategy, product-innovation, brand-innovation, business-innovation, brand-positioning, experience-design, creative-development, visual-design, ecommerce, mobile-commerce, technology-development, unpaid-media-stratetgy, analytics
overview:
Hi! We are an innovation company driven by unconventional wisdom.

We believe innovation  & outright invention unlock business potential. We come from an interdisciplinary mix of strategy, creative, business, design, technology and development backgrounds. We solve brand, marketing, and business problems by envisioning and deploying unique digital and social innovation through the key practices of relentless collaboration and outright invention—a process and passion to not only imagine things, but to make ideas real.

We’re privileged to partner with some of the world’s most interesting and innovative companies. Our clients range from leading, global brands—including Avon, American Express, BBC Worldwide, Coach, Dyson, General Mills, 19 Entertainment, Orange Wireless, Virgin and Skype—to more entrepreneurial companies creating big waves of their own—including Alphamom, Fahrenheit 212, Tegu Toys and Zopa. To ensure we keep up with the pace of digital and social technology, we’re also deeply engaged in developing and launching our own POKE products—including BakerTweet, Kideoplayer, The LeBron Button,  Happpy It! and UPL8.TV.
